New Zealand mother Siva Auvae, 31, stabbed to death in Queensland in domestic violence incident https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/new-zealand-mother-31-stabbed-to-death-in-queensland-in-domestic-violence-incident/Y7WA2EWXAFHELAGKTR4WDFNXJQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/new-zealand-mother-31-stabbed-to-death-in-queensland-in-domestic-violence-incident/Y7WA2EWXAFHELAGKTR4WDFNXJQ/ The woman's long-term partner died of burn injuries after reportedly setting house on fire Sun, 10 Dec 2023 17:56:52 +0000 Siva Auvae, 31, was stabbed to death by her partner in Karrangur, Brisbane on December 9. Photo / Givealittle
Auckland University researchers launch tool to detect early dementia in Māori https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/auckland-university-researchers-launch-tool-to-detect-early-dementia-in-maori/JMWM2GWIBFALZJUHB7X7UIN4NQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/auckland-university-researchers-launch-tool-to-detect-early-dementia-in-maori/JMWM2GWIBFALZJUHB7X7UIN4NQ/ Kelvin McDonald‘Mana’ tool integrated into Health NZ for clinicians diagnosing dementia. Sun, 10 Dec 2023 17:44:16 +0000 Dementia has been labeled as a silent epidemic in New Zealand where more than 70,000 people suffer the terminal brain disease. That number is projected to grow to 170,000 by 2050.
